Title: Snow Day
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Lauren Bans, Lacey Marisa Friedman (executive story editor), Lauren Bans (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam and Barry learn something new about Murray while Erica's college application has a surprise for Beverly.
